long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_GB,en_US,e: Calculate your total spending on Amazon and Flipkart sites
long.en,en_AU:
Use this extension to calculate total spending on Amazon and Flipkart. 

The Spending tracker for Amazon and Flipkart chrome extension helps users keep track of their spending on two of the most popular e-commerce platforms. The extension calculates the rear-wise total amount spent on orders made through Amazon™ and Flipkart™, allowing users to track their spending over time and make more informed purchasing decisions. 


How to use Spending tracker for Amazon & Flipkart? 

>> Install the extension and pin it to your chrome browser 
>> Visit the Amazon & Flipkart website and login to your account 
>> Go to my orders section                                                                                                                                               >> Now click on extension icon
>> Click on Calculate Now


Key Features

Here are the key features of the Spending tracker for Amazon™ and Flipkart™.  

>> Amazon Expense Tracker & Flipkart Spending Analyzer

Track your total spending on popular e-commerce platforms like Amazon and Flipkart.
Get insights into your purchases across different timeframes, such as weekly, monthly, and yearly spending patterns.

>> Amazon Order Total Calculator

Calculate the total amount spent on your Amazon orders with a single click. Provides a clear view of your shopping history and overall expenses to help you budget better.

>>Flipkart Spending Insights

Easily monitor your total yearly, monthly, weekly  spending on Flipkart, making it simple to evaluate and plan your shopping behavior.

>> Leaderboard for Competitive Spending Insights

Compete with your friends or other users by comparing your spending on Amazon and Flipkart through an interactive leaderboard. Motivates smarter and more mindful shopping habits.

>> Visual Reports for Better Spending Analysis

Provides graphs and charts that represent spending trends over time. Visualize your Amazon and Flipkart shopping behaviors with a clean and intuitive interface.

>> Top Purchases Highlight

Displays your most expensive purchases to help you identify significant spending. A great tool to keep track of your high-value orders on Amazon and Flipkart.

>> Referral and Rewards System

Earn rewards by inviting friends to use the extension.
Share your referral code and grow your savings while helping others track their expenses.

>> Quick and Simple User Interface
Provides a toggle feature to switch seamlessly between Amazon 
Expense Tracker and Flipkart Spending Analyzer. Access your spending reports without leaving the shopping site.

>> Privacy-Focused Data Security

Your data is processed securely and never shared with third parties. Provides peace of mind while offering powerful analytics for your spending.



Why Use the Ecom Spending Calculator?

Amazon Expense Tracker: It enables you to know how much you've spent on Amazon over time.

Flipkart Yearly Spending: It helps you analyze your yearly Flipkart spending patterns with ease.

This extension is perfect for budget-conscious shoppers, financial planners, and anyone who wants to track and manage e-commerce expenses. With its easy-to-use interface and privacy-focused design, the Ecom Spending Calculator helps you in smarter shopping.
